movies.title: Wendy placa 20957
movies.plot: Wendy Aguilar is a recent graduate mossa d'Esquadra facing his first night on patrol with his partner Roger Dueso. After receiving a code 60 which reports a murder, Wendy and Roger are heading to the scene, where they will face an unusual case. The murder leads them to discover a secret chamber, which is missing a jewel called 'Eye of God', no one wants to report theft. Wendy Young will face, alone, to dangerous murderers. You will have to run, fight and use the gun ... Despite being'' rookie'' Wendy is willing to settle this case ...

biography.bio: Leticia Dolera was born on October 23, 1981 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain. She is an actress and writer, known for [REC] 3: Genesis (2012), Al salir de clase (1997) and Requisitos para ser una persona normal (2015). She is married to Paco Plaza.
biography.name: Leticia Dolera

biography.placeOfBirth: Arenys de Munt, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain
biography.bio: Mercè Llorens was born on May 14, 1978 in Arenys de Munt, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Mercé Llorens Serrà. She is an actress, known for The Great Vazquez (2010), Mesrine Part 1: Killer Instinct (2008) and The Whore and the Whale (2004).
biography.name: Mercè Llorens

biography.bio: Òscar Molina is an actor, known for Laberint d'ombres (1998), Wendy placa 20957 (2009) and Amistad (2010).

biography.bio: Ignasi Vidal was born on January 27, 1973 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain. He is known for his work on Lalola (2008), The Last Circus (2010) and Beyond Re-Animator (2003).
biography.name: Ignasi Vidal

biography.bio: Andreu Castro is an actor and director, known for La soledad de las palabras (2014), Yo quisiera (2015) and Flores para Maika (2003).
